text: @realDonaldTrump This celebration of #COVID19 is sick. @realDonaldTrump is celebrating the worse handling of a pandemic in modern history murdering over 100,000 and ppl are still on ventilators or struggling to get well. Getting Hitler out the @WhiteHouse in #2020 @PressSec
